Articles.Content: I currently use REALPLUME for ksp, but I have seen a few people saying good things about WATERFALL, and so I was just wondering about other peoples options on which one I should use

I believe Waterfall is meant to be installed on top of Realplume, and Realplume plumes get used if there's no Waterfall plume available. The primary issue is that Waterfall is still fairly experimental, so it's a question of whether you want to potentially deal with issues with the relatively new Waterfall mod.

12 hours ago, eNeRGy_kerman said:

I currently use REALPLUME for ksp, but I have seen a few people saying good things about WATERFALL, and so I was just wondering about other peoples options on which one I should use

Waterfall. It looks better and performs *MUCH* better.

1 hour ago, Spaceman.Spiff said:

Waterfall. It looks better and performs *MUCH* better.

Waterfall is fantastic. But it doesn't work at the moment for SRBs. So I would download both of them for the moment. But Waterfall is the way to go with Liquid Engine, while Real Plume sticks around for the SRBs.
